mutants.code:
def lengthOfLongestSubstring(s):
    char_set = set()
    left = 1
    result = 0
    for right in range(len(s)):
        while s[right] in char_set:
            char_set.remove(s[left])
            left += 1
        char_set.add(s[right])
        result = max(result, right - left + 1)
    return result

def lengthOfLongestSubstring(s):
    char_set = set()
    left = -1
    result = 0
    for right in range(len(s)):
        while s[right] in char_set:
            char_set.remove(s[left])
            left += 1
        char_set.add(s[right])
        result = max(result, right - left + 1)
    return result
